/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on the responsibility of different VA divisions for making determinations in SAH or SHA claims, including the responsibility for
determining SAH/SHA eligibility and entitlement
, and
medical feasibility determinations in SAH/SHA claims
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B - Specially Adapted Housing (SAH) or Special Home Adaptation (SHA) Grants
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B
